This directive serves to control the relationships between Par- tiki units in the Crystal Body, which translates into operational instructions for the bio-energetic system and DNA to follow. Light-Symbol Codes can be used to direct patterns of frequency into the bio-energetic field and DNA in very specific ways that will allow dormant potentials of the DNA to come into operation. The DNA directs the manifest functions of the physical body and the physically embodied consciousness, following the design set by the Light-Symbol Code program within the Crystal Body. Cellular Transmutation can be achieved by adding new frequency pat- terns into the Crystal Body by changing the program of the Light-Symbol 457
